hospital
quality

Healthcare pricing is opaque, confusing - and, therefore, ripe for visualization. My interactive visual below enables users to compare cost, quality, and size of 1800 medicare/medicaid hospitals. Filters enable the user to pick apart smaller trends, and explore this public dataset from the bottom-up.
A static form of this poster was displayed in the HIMSS healthcare conference, with an accompanying blog post here

data visualization / data science / d3.js
